text: Yes, @ realDonaldTrump needs to reunite the children with their parents NOW. He has the power of the United States government. They can reunite the children with their parents. We can all do this with DNA tests, social media, word of mouth... no child left behind # MAGA # Resistance
Please grow up! This is ridiculous ! You are acting like a child on social media rather than the president of the United States ! Please stop ....

Yes people you are correct. This is a tweet on social media from the President of the United States attempting to discredit a porn star who he screwed days after his 3rd wife gave birth to his 5th child. Trumps has always failed to take responsibility for his actions. pic.twitter.com/b4f5OVW8kZ

@ realDonaldTrump please delete your Twitter... a president of the United States shouldn't be on social media complaining so damn much... learn to brush shit off and move on and fix this broken nation instead of complaing about bs online... you are acting like an insecure child...

Never, never in the history of the United States has a President gone on social media to brag about the size of our nuclear arsenal and belittle one world leader after another. @ realDonaldTrump is a selfish, condescending child with no concept what class is.

Well social media is f***ing up everyone, even the ones that are already f***ed up, It’s so cringey seeing how the freaking president of the United States is using nicknames for the leaders of other countries, you’re THE president not a child.

This is very childish and petty... As the President of the United States of America. You reflect on all American people. We try teach our kids not to run to social media saying rude hurtful things as a child would. A person whom does things out of good will never speak on it..

How about instead of being a petulant child about his response you rise above it like the adult you're supposed to be (let alone the president of the United States) and leave it off social media? You're literally acting like a bitchy schoolgirl.
You're the President of the United States, please stop acting like a child on social media....
You're the President of the United States not a child. Grow up and focus on your job and not on memes and social media. # Actlikeyougiveadamn
